items.sentence: Tom was so drunk that he didn\'t even recognize me.
Do you remember what time you woke up this morning?
The kidnappers wanted Tom to blow up that building.
The only flavor ice cream that Tom eats is vanilla.
The teacher dismissed his class when the bell rang.
I want to know who you\'re going to the dance with.
I want to show you something I\'ve been working on.
I forgot that I was supposed to be there yesterday.
Tom told me that he won\'t tell Mary what happened.
What\'s the most dangerous thing you\'ve ever done?
